Message:
That day,
I was on my way
to go see Daddy,
just like I did every day.

But this time,
my mom and dad stopped me.

Their voices were so soft...
Their faces...so uneasy...
I got a really bad feeling.
It was the same one as before.

My chest felt so tight...
like it was...

“Forgive us, dear.
This is the only way
to save you.”

“From now on,
things might get
really tough for you,
but God will surely
watch over you.”

With tears in their eyes,
my mom and dad
gave me a big hug...

...before softly
pushing me outside,
and shutting the door
behind me.
